dataManagement

Class DocumentIDX

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataManagement.DocumentIDX

  • public class DocumentIDX
extends java.lang.Object
    Map that contains the data in memory of the IDX file corresponding to a particular document in the index. An object of this type is created for any document that matches a particular search.
    Author:
    pedroirivera-vega

      • DocumentIDX

        public DocumentIDX(int docID)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes this instance with current content of the particular idx file that corresponds to the identified document.
        Parameters:
        docID - id of the document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if file format does not match expected format
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if docID does not match any existing idx file in the system
